member.name: T:Microsoft.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilders.SimpleJsonConfigBuilderMode
member.summary: Possible modes (or paradigms) for parsing a json source file.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilders.SimpleJsonConfigBuilderMode.Flat
member.summary: The whole file is flattened into a single key/value collection.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilders.SimpleJsonConfigBuilderMode.Sectional
member.summary: Use top-level objects to separate into different dictionaries per config section.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilders.SimpleJsonConfigBuilder
member.summary: A ConfigurationProvider that retrieves values from a json config file.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilders.SimpleJsonConfigBuilder.JsonFile
member.summary: Gets or sets a path to the json file to be read.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilders.SimpleJsonConfigBuilder.JsonMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the json parsing paradigm to be used by the SimpleJsonConfigBuilder.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilders.SimpleJsonConfigBuilder.LazyInitialize(System.String,System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)
member.param: The friendly name of the provider.
A collection of the name/value pairs representing builder-specific attributes specified in the configuration for this provider.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilders.SimpleJsonConfigBuilder.GetValue(System.String)
member.summary: Looks up a single 'value' for the given 'key.'
member.param: The 'key' to look up in the json source. (Prefix handling is not needed here.)
member.returns: The value corresponding to the given 'key' or null if no value is found.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilders.SimpleJsonConfigBuilder.GetAllValues(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves all known key/value pairs from the json source where the key begins with with .
member.param: A prefix string to filter the list of potential keys retrieved from the source.
